Description: Rest on the flight into Egypt; the Virgin dips a bowl into a pool of water as Joseph and Jesus play with a tree branch with berries; the donkey stands at left; copy in reverse of a plate engraved by Cornelis Cort after Barocci Engraving
Producer name: After: Cornelis Cort (copy of a print by)
Curator's comments: A copy of a plate engraved by Cornelis Cort in 1575, see 1928,0313.119. Hollstein records sixteen copies of the plate, but in the absence of any inscription it is difficult to determine which one it is.
Bibliographic references: New Hollstein (Dutch & Flemish) / The New Hollstein: Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts 1450-1700 (40) (Cornelis Cort; copy)
Bierens de Haan 1948 / L'oeuvre gravé de Cornelis Cort, graveur hollandais 1533-1578 (43) (copy)
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Hans Sloane (backed and with the Sloane stamp applied in the 1870s)
